title: Sri Lanka Economic Crisis Live Updates: Amid protests, govt imposes 36-hour curfew across country - The Indian Express

description: Sri Lanka Economic Crisis Live Updates: Anger against Rajapaksa's handling of a deepening economic crisis in the island nation of 22 million people spiralled into violence late on Thursday
